member.name: T:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder
member.summary: Fluent builder for generating C# source code with proper indentation and formatting. Wraps StringBuilder with helper methods for common code generation patterns.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.IndentLevel
member.summary: Gets the current indentation level (0-based).

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.Indent
member.summary: Increases the indentation level.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.Unindent
member.summary: Decreases the indentation level.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendLine(System.String)
member.summary: Appends a line of code with proper indentation.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.Append(System.String)
member.summary: Appends text without a newline (respects current indentation if at line start).

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.OpenBrace(System.String)
member.summary: Appends an opening brace and increases indentation.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.CloseBrace(System.String)
member.summary: Decreases indentation and appends a closing brace.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.BlankLine
member.summary: Appends a blank line.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendFileHeader(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Appends a file header comment block.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendUsings(System.String[])
member.summary: Appends using directives.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Appends a namespace declaration and opens the brace.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.CloseNamespace
member.summary: Closes the namespace (unindents and closes brace).

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendXmlSummary(System.String)
member.summary: Appends an XML documentation comment (summary).

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendXmlParam(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends an XML documentation comment (param).

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendXmlReturns(System.String)
member.summary: Appends an XML documentation comment (returns).

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendClassDeclaration(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Appends a class declaration and opens the brace.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendMethodDeclaration(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Appends a method declaration and opens the brace.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.AppendProperty(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Appends a property declaration.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.WithIndent(System.Action{REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder})
member.summary: Executes an action at the current indentation level. Useful for nested code generation.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.ToString
member.summary: Returns the generated code as a string.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.CodeGeneration.CodeBuilder.Clear
member.summary: Clears all content from the builder.

member.name: T:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Configuration.GeneratorConfigurationBase
member.summary: Base configuration class for source generators. Inherit from this to add generator-specific configuration properties.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Configuration.GeneratorConfigurationBase.Clone
member.summary: Creates a copy of this configuration. Override this in derived classes to include additional properties.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Configuration.GeneratorConfigurationBase.Validate
member.summary: Validates the configuration. Override this to add custom validation logic.
member.returns: True if configuration is valid, false otherwise.

member.name: T:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Configuration.IGeneratorConfiguration
member.summary: Base interface for all generator configurations. Provides common properties that all generators should support.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Configuration.IGeneratorConfiguration.Namespace
member.summary: The namespace for generated code.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Configuration.IGeneratorConfiguration.IncludeDiagnostics
member.summary: Whether to include detailed diagnostic comments in generated code.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Configuration.IGeneratorConfiguration.IncludeDocumentation
member.summary: Whether to include XML documentation comments in generated code.

member.name: T:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Infrastructure.AttributeParser
member.summary: Utility for parsing configuration from attributes. Provides type-safe extraction of attribute arguments.

member.summary: Checks if an attribute has a specific named argument.

member.name: T:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Infrastructure.IncrementalGeneratorBase`1
member.summary: Base class for incremental source generators with configuration support. Provides common infrastructure for attribute discovery, configuration parsing, and code generation orchestration.
member.typeparam: The configuration type for this generator.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Infrastructure.IncrementalGeneratorBase`1.AttributeFullName
member.summary: The fully qualified name of the attribute that enables this generator.

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Infrastructure.IncrementalGeneratorBase`1.AttributeShortName
member.summary: The short name of the attribute (without namespace).

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Infrastructure.IncrementalGeneratorBase`1.GeneratedFileName
member.summary: The name of the generated file (without extension).

member.name: P:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Infrastructure.IncrementalGeneratorBase`1.AttributeSourceCode
member.summary: The source code for the attribute to be embedded in consuming projects.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Infrastructure.IncrementalGeneratorBase`1.ParseConfiguration(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.AttributeData)
member.summary: Parses the configuration from the attribute data. Override this to parse generator-specific configuration properties.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Infrastructure.IncrementalGeneratorBase`1.ParseAdditionalConfiguration(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.AttributeData,`0)
member.summary: Override this to parse additional configuration properties specific to your generator.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Infrastructure.IncrementalGeneratorBase`1.GenerateCode(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Compilation,`0)
member.summary: Generates the source code for this generator. This is the main code generation method that derived classes must implement.

member.name: T:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Utilities.HttpStatusCodeMapper
member.summary: Maps error types and messages to appropriate HTTP status codes. Provides convention-based and configurable mapping strategies.

member.summary: Adds a custom mapping from error type name to HTTP status code.

member.summary: Adds multiple custom mappings from a string array. Format: "ErrorTypeName:StatusCode"

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Utilities.HttpStatusCodeMapper.DetermineStatusCode(System.String)
member.summary: Determines the HTTP status code for a given error type name. Priority: Custom mappings > Convention-based > Default

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Utilities.HttpStatusCodeMapper.DetermineStatusCodeFromMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Determines the HTTP status code from an error message. Uses pattern matching on common error message phrases.

member.summary: Gets the HTTP status text for a given status code.

member.name: M:REslava.Result.SourceGenerators.Core.Utilities.HttpStatusCodeMapper.GetCustomMappings
member.summary: Gets all configured custom mappings.
